thread.title: New Logan TV Spot Shows Off X-23's Claws
thread.title_full: New Logan TV Spot Shows Off X-23's Claws

author: Megan Peters
title: New Logan TV Spot Shows Off X-23's Claws
text:
New Logan TV Spot Shows Off X-23's Claws Megan Peters   
Next week, the X-Men Cinematic Universe is going to grow with yet another film. After X-Men: Apocalypse debuted last summer, Hugh Jackman will bid farewell to his long-held place in the franchise with Logan . The leading man is set to don Wolverine ’s claws one last time in the blockbuster, but the actor won’t be the only mutant slicing and dicing. Set in a distant future, Logan will follow the grumpy mutant as he cares for an aging Professor Xavier, but the two will be forced into action again when a young girl winds up on their doorstep. And, when she gets provoked, you can expect the claws to come out. MORE: Logan Official Review 
In the most recent TV spot for Logan , fans can get a better look at the girl’s familiar mutation. The heroine, who is named Laura, is seen being dragged before she unsheathes a single metal claw from her foot. When the shot changes, Logan can be seen looking surprised by Laura’s gift as he has one like hers. While he can extend three adamantium-coated claws from his hands, Laura can extend blades from her hands and feet. 
Of course, comic book fans will not be too phased by Laura’s powers. The character is taken from the pages of Marvel’s comics where she is better known as X-23 . Having been cloned from Wolverine, Laura manifests a similar mutation to the X-Men before she is bred into a deadly assassin who one days goes rogue. 
In Logan , Dafne Keen will be playing Laura, and it looks like the actress may have a future with the franchise should she want. Recently, director James Mangold gushed over Keen’s acting abilities and said he’d be surprised if fans didn’t see more of her. 
"I think Dafne is a remarkable actress and I think she does an incredible job with this role. Personally, I would be shocked if we don’t look into trying to develop that character further,” Mangold stressed. 
Are you excited to see Logan ? Let us know how hyped you are with our anticipation rankings! Currently, the film is #6 on our site! 
Logan takes place in the year 2029, where mutant births have become extremely rare. The defenders of mutant kind, the X-Men , are long gone, and the only remains of them are an old and struggling Charles Xavier and a weary Logan. Logan's vaunted healing factor has slowed, and at times doesn't seem to work at all. When a young mutant needs his help, Logan has to unsheathe his claws once more. His job isn't over yet. (Photo: 20th Century Fox) 
Logan stars Hugh Jackman (Logan), Boyd Holbrook (Donald Pierce), Patrick Stewart (Charles Xavier), Dafne Keen (Laura Kinney/X-23), Doris Morgado (Maria), Stephen Merchant (Caliban), Elizabeth Rodriguez (Gabriela), and Richard E. Grant (Dr. Zander Rice). James Mangold is directing and helped on the screenplay along with Scott Frank and Michael Green.
